Player History
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 3/3/1988 to a minor league contract.
Traded from Atlanta to Cincinnati on 6/1/1988 (Going to CIN: C Ivan Rodriguez. Going to ATL: P Jeff Montgomery, P Curt Schilling, 1B Hal Morris)...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 1990...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1991, off Dan Plesac (LAD)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/18/1991, off Manny Hernandez (LAD)...
